name: TapTapBadger
storyline:
Hibernation is over and the evil psy-Badgerinator need feathers and hedgehog spikes to make more mind controlling acupuncture tools for his world domination plans.
Badgers have been brainwashed to capture hedgehogs and birds. Tough-lovingly Tap these badgers to show them back to reason and help save the poor hedgehogs and birds escape to a safe heaven.
Now in space! the psy-Badgerinator was able to send his mind controlled platoon of badgers to the moon and mars. They need to be stopped more than ever. Hurry!
summary:
Be a Hero! use the unique powers of your fingers to tap away the mean badgers and save the world from the evil psy-Badgerinator!
Grow precise reflexes and powerful concentration skills like no others and prove it to all on the leaderboards.
